oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The fundamental group scheme of a smooth projective variety over a ring of Witt vectors
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MEHTA, VB
SUBRAMANIAN, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider a smooth projective variety X-(W) over bar, over the ring of Witt vectors W (k) over an algebraically closed field of characteristic p. We study the Fundamental Group Scheme of X-(W) over bar and its representations over W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE RAMANUJAN MATHEMATICAL SOCIETY, 28A341-351
